With our fresh perspective and innovative approach, we bring you the insights and inspiration you need to thrive and be more productive in today's fast-paced world. Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Beauty Queen Asked To Resign From Her Jobs For Being Too Pretty…
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Although she was well qualified and trained with a double degree in European studies and from the faculty of law, she was made to resign from her jobs for being too pretty...

The post Beauty Queen Asked To Resign From Her Jobs For Being Too Pretty… appeared first on The New Vibes.
